properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 7 at 10:25AM EST by NWS Raleigh NC
properties.description:
...The National Weather Service in Raleigh has issued a
Flood Warning for the following rivers in North Carolina...
Neuse River Near Goldsboro affecting Wayne County

...Forecast flooding changed from Moderate to Major severity for the
following rivers in North Carolina...
Neuse River At Smithfield affecting Johnston County

The National Weather Service in Raleigh has issued a

* Flood Warning for
The Neuse River Near Goldsboro.
* from Saturday morning until further notice, or until the warning is
cancelled.
* At  9:15 AM Friday the stage was 13.0 feet.
* Flood stage is 18.0 feet.
* Moderate flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage by
tomorrow morning and continue to rise to near 22.1 feet by
Wednesday morning. Additional rises are possible thereafter.
* Impact...At 22.0 feet, Flooding begins on Seymour Johnson Air Force
Base.
properties.instruction:
Safety message. If you encounter deep water while driving, do not
attempt to drive through. Turn around, dont drown.
